gallery.name: Meet Employers
gallery.desc: Industry Employer Speed Dating provides graduating students with an opportunity to meet local employers to kick-start their career.

gallery.name: Workshops
gallery.desc: The Cyber Security Workshop provides a hands on experience on how to protect your self digitally. We are promoting Cyber Security as a career for the next generation. Our workshop is tailored around the current themes for digitally engaged kids.

gallery.name: Awards
gallery.desc: oin us to recognise high achieving CDU IT students from around Australia. Supported by the NT Department of Corporate Information Services. $100 for the top student in each IT unit. Awards begin the Code Fair
